name: Hannibal Barca
title: Carthaginian Military Commander
biography: Hannibal Barca was a Carthaginian general and statesman who commanded the forces of Carthage in their battle against the Roman Republic during the Second Punic War. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest military tacticians and generals in history.

name: Queen Nzinga
title: Queen of Ndongo and Matamba
biography: Queen Nzinga was a 17th-century queen of the Ndongo and Matamba Kingdoms in present-day Angola. She was a skilled military tactician and diplomat who fought against Portuguese colonization for over 30 years.

name: Mansa Musa
title: Emperor of Mali
biography: Mansa Musa was the tenth emperor of the Mali Empire, ruling from 1312 to 1337. He is famous for his pilgrimage to Mecca and is often considered the wealthiest individual in history.
